introduction: One day, Mari surprises us by asking for shelter at Adriana's, one of the houses where she has been working as a maid for many years, because she has just left her own house, where she lived with her husband, children and grandchildren. Against social and family pressures, she begins to talk about the abuse she suffered, to recover her voice and her will, and she rediscovers herself. At the same time, her relationship with Adriana and her family changes.
